column1: I think that it is a great idea to get some press regarding our fundamental operating standards , but I wonder about the most appropriate timing , enough of a global message and the means of delivery .
column2: I think that it is a great idea to get some press regarding our fundamental operating standard @@s , but I wonder about the most appropriate timing , enough of a global message and the means of delivery .

column2: On the means of delivery , I am not sure from your note whether or not I fully understand the intent .

column1: Or is the letter from John an introduction to be included as a lead in to the article ?

column1: With regard to a global message , I think that one of the key points around fundamental operating standards are that they are intended to be global in nature , applied to every commodity and every location where we engage in trading activities .
column2: With regard to a global message , I think that one of the key points around fundamental operating standard @@s are that they are intended to be global in nature , applied to every commodity and every location where we engage in trading activities .

column1: These global standards also should enable Enron to expand its business reach more quickly , with well defined requirements with regard to trading operations .
column2: These global standard @@s also should enable Enron to expand its business reach more quickly , with well defined requirement @@s with regard to trading operation @@s .

column1: I am not sure from the article as written that the global nature of this effort comes across .
column2: I am not sure from the article as written that the global nature of this effort comes across .

column1: Finally , a question regarding timing .
column2: Finally , a question regarding timing .

column1: The last I knew after you and Brent drafted this starting point for fundamental operating standards was that this was being circulated ( Shona took this to do after Brent 's return to Houston ) for comments to all business controllers .
column2: The last I knew after you and Brent drafted this starting point for fundamental operating standard @@s was that this was being circulated ( Shona took this to do after Brent 's return to Houston ) for comment @@s to all business controllers .

column1: I do n't believe that we are quite at the point that we can say that all business controllers worldwide have reviewed , understand and have implemented these standards .
column2: I do n't believe that we are quite at the point that we can say that all business controllers worldwide have reviewed , understand and have implemented these standard @@s .

column1: And not to belittle the process of creating the standards , the tough part ( and the real meat behind this ) will be an effective exception report on a global basis against these standards .
column2: And not to belittle the process of creating the standard @@s , the tough part ( and the real meat behind this ) will be an effective exception report on a global basis against these standard @@s .

column1: My commitment to Rick Causey is that I will have that global report in production by the end of the year .
column2: My commitment to Rick Causey is that I will have that global report in production by the end of the year .

column1: There is much work to do in defining the content and regularity of the report and even more work to do to identify reliable sources of data for compiling the report .
column2: There is much work to do in defining the content and regularity of the report and even more work to do to identify reliable sources of data for compiling the report .

column1: A currency Transaction with Enron Europe Finance & Trading Limited ( " EEFTL " ) as agent for Risk Management & Trading Corp. under which either ( A ) for the case in which Counterparty submits an offer to buy from EEFTL , Counterparty shall receive the Base Currency Amount and shall pay the Foreign Currency Amount , or ( B ) for the case in which Counterparty submits an offer to sell to EEFTL , Counterparty shall pay the Base Currency Amount and shall receive the Foreign Currency Amount .
column2: A currency Transaction with Enron Europe Finance & Trading Limited ( " EEFTL " ) as agent for Risk Management & Trading Corp. under which either ( A ) for the case in which Counterparty submit @@s an offer to buy from EEFTL , Counterparty shall receive the Base Currency Amount and shall pay the Foreign Currency Amount , or ( B ) for the case in which Counterparty submit @@s an offer to sell to EEFTL , Counterparty shall pay the Base Currency Amount and shall receive the Foreign Currency Amount .

column1: The Base Currency Amount shall equal the volume submitted by the Counterparty via the Website .
column2: The Base Currency Amount shall equal the volume submitted by the Counterparty via the Website .

column1: The Foreign Currency Amount shall equal the Base Currency Amount , multiplied by the daily London Metal Exchange ( LME ) fixing rate as published by Reuters on page MTLE on the date of the transaction , modified by the price submitted by the Counterparty via the Website .
column2: The Foreign Currency Amount shall equal the Base Currency Amount , multiplied by the daily London Metal Exchange ( LME ) fixing rate as published by Reuters on page MTLE on the date of the transaction , modified by the price submitted by the Counterparty via the Website .

column1: The Settlement date shall be the date ( s ) set forth in the Product description on the Website .

column2: The price is quoted in JPY ( the ' Foreign Currency ' ) per US Dollar ( the ' Base Currency ' ) .

column1: As you know , the suffix ONLINE is purely descriptive and now used by many companies .
column2: As you know , the suffix ONLINE is purely descriptive and now used by many companies .

column1: Therefore , any trade mark registration that incorporates the word ONLINE as a suffix in the way that you use it will not enable its owner to prevent others from using the word ONLINE .
column2: Therefore , any trade mark registration that incorporate @@s the word ONLINE as a suffix in the way that you use it will not enable its owner to prevent others from using the word ONLINE .

column1: Given the above , if you have adequate protection for the word ENRON ( which covers the services that you offer on - line as well as your core activities ) , I 'd say that another application for the words ENRON ONLINE is probably unnecessary .
column2: Given the above , if you have adequate protection for the word ENRON ( which covers the service @@s that you offer on - line as well as your core activities ) , I 'd say that another application for the words ENRON ONLINE is probably unnecessary .

column1: However , if you use a particular logo for the on - line service , that should be registered .
column2: However , if you use a particular logo for the on - line service , that should be registered .

column1: Attached is PG&E 's Gas Accord II ( GA II ) Settlement Proposal .
column2: Attached is PG&E 's Gas Accord II ( GA II ) Settlement Proposal .

column1: We believe it addresses many of the issues and concerns you have raised in the workshops .
column2: We believe it addresses many of the issues and concern @@s you have raised in the workshop @@s .

column1: As an overview , this proposal : * Maintains the basic Gas Accord structure in place today for the period 2003 to 2007 . *
column2: As an overview , this proposal : * Maintains the basic Gas Accord structure in place today for the period 2003 to 2007 . *

column1: * Offers end user transportation rates for 2003 lower for most customers than rates in effect today . *
column2: * Offer @@s end user transportation rates for 2003 lower for most customer @@s than rates in effect today . *

column1: * Provides for vintaged Redwood path rates for core customers . *
column2: * Provide @@s for vintaged Redwood path rates for core customer @@s . *

column1: * Offers a 7.5 cent / dth rate to large customers while minimizing rate changes to other customers , minimizing the incentive for these customers to seek to bypass local transmission charges and other CPUC - approved charges . *
column2: * Offer @@s a 7.5 cent / dth rate to large customer @@s while minimizing rate change @@s to other customer @@s , minimizing the incentive for these customer @@s to seek to bypass local transmission charge @@s and other CPUC - approved charge @@s . *

column1: * Adopts guidelines to improve reliability and help moderate prices in gas commodity markets , and identifies the capital projects needed to meet these guidelines over the course of the GA II period ( 2003 - 2007 ) . *
column2: * Adopts guidelines to improve reliability and help moderate prices in gas commodity market @@s , and identifies the capital project @@s needed to meet these guidelines over the course of the GA II period ( 2003 - 2007 ) . *

column1: * Provides a high degree of rate stability , with a 3.5 % escalator to capture both inflation and the cost of needed capital projects .
column2: * Provide @@s a high degree of rate stability , with a 3.5 % escalator to capture both inflation and the cost of needed capital project @@s .

column1: The guaranteed rates will be adjustable only for significant changes in the cost of capital or increased costs due to governmental requirements or catastrophic events . *
column2: The guaranteed rates will be adjustable only for significant change @@s in the cost of capital or increased costs due to governmental requirement @@s or catastrophic events . *

column1: * Preserves a rate differential between the Redwood and Baja paths , although somewhat less than the current differential . *
column2: * Preserves a rate differential between the Redwood and Baja paths , although somewhat less than the current differential . *

column1: * Proposes a two - stage open season for firm transportation services beginning in 2003 , with end users receiving a first option on available capacity . *
column2: * Proposes a two - stage open season for firm transportation service @@s beginning in 2003 , with end users receiving a first option on available capacity . *

column1: * Maintains the core aggregation program with some adjustments .
column2: * Maintains the core aggregation program with some adjustment @@s .

column2: This also will serve as a reminder that an all - Party meeting is scheduled at PG&E 's headquarters in San Francisco on January 10 and 11 , to discuss this proposal and to respond to your question @@s .

column2: We look forward to answering your question @@s and receiving your feedback .

column1: What happened ?
column2: What happened ?

column1: Here 's a story ... as I was waiting at the bus stop ( 7:35 am ) to go to school , a lady approached me and asked if I 'd make sure her daughter got on a certain bus .
column2: Here 's a story ... as I was waiting at the bus stop ( 7:35 am ) to go to school , a lady approached me and asked if I 'd make sure her daughter got on a certain bus .

column1: The mother was running late for work and could not wait .
column2: The mother was running late for work and could not wait .

column1: It was now , 8:15 and there was no sign of her bus .
column2: It was now , 8:15 and there was no sign of her bus .

column1: On top of things , I had quiz at 8 am .
column2: On top of things , I had quiz at 8 am .

column1: Which I then realized I missed .
column2: Which I then realized I missed .

column1: I decided that Nicki would just have to wait on her own .
column2: I decided that Nicki would just have to wait on her own .

column1: I asked her if she had any relatives that would want to know of her whereabouts .
column2: I asked her if she had any relative @@s that would want to know of her whereabouts .

column1: I called her grandmother and explained things to her .
column2: I called her grandmother and explained things to her .

column1: Pretty strange ... aye .
column2: Pretty strange ... aye .

column1: A bus that runs through UofH arrived and I almost got on without her , but I could n't do it .
column2: A bus that runs through UofH arrived and I almost got on without her , but I could n't do it .

column1: Finally , I told the little girl that she would have to accompany me to school ( 8:30 am ) .
column2: Finally , I told the little girl that she would have to accompany me to school ( 8:30 am ) .

column1: There were only 15 minutes left of class .
column2: There were only 15 minutes left of class .

column1: I stayed for the remainder of the lecture .
column2: I stayed for the remainder of the lecture .

column1: After class we went back to bus stop and within minutes her bus arrived .
column2: After class we went back to bus stop and within minutes her bus arrived .

column1: I told the bus driver where to drop her off .
column2: I told the bus driver where to drop her off .

column1: I notified her grandmother with the time of the departure .
column2: I notified her grandmother with the time of the departure .

column1: And I was relieved when Nicki called to let me know she was home safe .
column2: And I was relieved when Nicki called to let me know she was home safe .

column1: Please note the following as you review :
column2: Please note the following as you review :

column1: 1 . The short forms do not contain the optionality relating to our performing billing services -- all of our midmarket forms anticipate that we will act as customer 's billing agent and that we will collect all amounts due related to T&D and the like from the customer ( and reflect same on our invoice ) and pass those amounts on to the customer 's utility .
column2: 1 . The short forms do not contain the optionality relating to our performing billing service @@s - @@- all of our midmarket forms anticipate that we will act as customer 's billing agent and that we will collect all amounts due related to T&D and the like from the customer ( and reflect same on our invoice ) and pass those amounts on to the customer 's utility .

column1: 2 . I did not include a " Setoff " provision in this draft , mainly because the vast majority of the time , we will not , nor will an affiliate , have another agreement in place with these customers .
column2: 2 . I did not include a " Setoff " provision in this draft , mainly because the vast majority of the time , we will not , nor will an affiliate , have another agreement in place with these customer @@s .

column1: If you feel strongly about our including a setoff provision , we will do so .
column2: If you feel strongly about our including a setoff provision , we will do so .

column1: 3 . The change in law provision reads a bit differently from the long form -- the thinking here is that the long form language is very lengthy and rather harsh ( and we 've had great difficulty selling it in the past ) .
column2: 3 . The change in law provision reads a bit different @@ly from the long form - @@- the thinking here is that the long form language is very lengthy and rather harsh ( and we 've had great difficulty selling it in the past ) .

column1: Also we do not address calculation of a termination payment in the event of a change in law as the long form does -- again , more in the interest of " saving space " than anything else ...
column2: Also we do not address calculation of a termination payment in the event of a change in law as the long form does - @@- again , more in the interest of " saving space " than anything else ...

column1: Probing the ' palace coup '
column2: Probing the ' palace coup '

column1: Electricity : A panel focuses on price hikes and the actions of the ISO president .
column2: Electricity : A panel focuses on price hikes and the actions of the ISO president .

column1: September 26 , 2001
column2: September 26 , 2001

column1: By KIMBERLY KINDY
column2: By KIMBERLY KINDY

column1: The Orange County Register
column2: The Orange County Register

column1: SACRAMENTO
column2: SACRAMENTO

column1: A state Senate committee is set today to start serving 16 subpoenas on electricity producers and officials who manage California 's energy grid to determine whether they acted in concert to manipulate energy prices .
column2: A state Senate committee is set today to start serving 16 subpoenas on electricity producers and official @@s who manage California 's energy grid to determine whether they acted in concert to manipulate energy prices .

column1: The investigative committee , headed by state Sen. Joe Dunn , D - Santa Ana , is focusing on a series of events last fall filled with enough Shakespearean plot twists and intrigue that it has earned a name around the Capitol : " the palace coup . "
column2: The investigative committee , headed by state Sen. Joe Dunn , D - Santa Ana , is focusing on a series of events last fall filled with enough Shakespearean plot twists and intrigue that it has earned a name around the Capitol : " the palace coup . "

column1: Lawmakers and consumer groups allege that the events - directed by the man who heads the state 's energy grid - fueled the California energy crisis , pushed the state into the power - buying business and helped make billions of dollars for power producers .
column2: Lawmakers and consumer groups allege that the events - directed by the man who heads the state 's energy grid - fueled the California energy crisis , pushed the state into the power - buying business and helped make billion @@s of dollars for power producers .

column1: The central question behind the palace coup is whether Terry Winter , the president of the Independent System Operator , acted alone when he took steps to remove key price caps designed to limit the amount power generators could charge .
column2: The central question behind the palace coup is whether Terry Winter , the president of the Independent System Operator , acted alone when he took steps to remove key price caps designed to limit the amount power generators could charge .

column1: Winter defied his own board and Gov. Gray Davis when he filed a 50 - page request to remove the caps , records and interviews show .
column2: Winter defied his own board and Gov. Gray Davis when he filed a 50 - page request to remove the caps , records and interview @@s show .

column1: I do n't know how these events could have taken place without some concerted effort ,  said Dunn .
column2: I do n't know how these events could have taken place without some concerted effort , said Dunn .

column1: Davis spokesman Steve Maviglio said the governor felt " betrayed " by the actions of Winter .
column2: Davis spokesman Steve Maviglio said the governor felt " betrayed " by the actions of Winter .

column1: The governor believes it was the defining moment , when what was a mounting problem turned into an instant crisis ,  Maviglio said .
column2: The governor believe @@s it was the defining moment , when what was a mounting problem turned into an instant crisis , Maviglio said .

column1: Winter refused comment , referring all questions to the public relations office .
column2: Winter refused comment , referring all question @@s to the public relation @@s office .

column1: ISO spokesman Gregg Fishman said Dunn 's committee will find no criminal conduct .
column2: ISO spokesman Gregg Fishman said Dunn 's committee will find no criminal conduct .

column1: The decision was made by ISO upper management with one goal in mind : to keep the lights on .
column2: The decision was made by ISO upper management with one goal in mind : to keep the lights on .

column1: At the time , generators were refusing to sell power in California because of the price caps .
column2: At the time , generators were refusing to sell power in California because of the price caps .

column1: It was an emergency ,  Fishman said .
column2: It was an emergency , Fishman said .

column1: We had to take action . ''	 We have @@ed to take act @@ion . ''
column2: We had to take action . '' We have @@ed to take act @@ion . ''

column1: They ( electricity generators ) grinned and beared the $ 750 price cap , but this new plan by ISO was too much ,  said Dunn , whose committee has been investigating since March .
column2: They ( electricity generators ) grinned and beared the $ 750 price cap , but this new plan by ISO was too much , said Dunn , whose committee has been investigating since March .

column1: All hell broke loose . ''	 All hell broke loose . ''
column2: All hell broke loose . '' All hell broke loose . ''

column1: Records show that on Oct. 31 , power generators and electricity traders filed letters with the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission , demanding that the new plan be killed .
column2: Record @@s show that on Oct. 31 , power generators and electricity traders filed letters with the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission , demanding that the new plan be killed .

column1: If not removed immediately , the ( ISO ) price cap will sow confusion in the market , threaten reliability and stifle new investment in generating capacity , '' read one letter written by Duke Energy Vice President William Hall III .	 If not re @@move @@ed im @@mediate @@ly , the ( ISO ) price cap will sow confuse @@ion in the market , threat @@en rely @@able @@ity and stifle new invest @@ment in generate @@ing capacity , '' read one let @@er write @@en by Duke Energy Vice President William Hall III .
column2: If not removed immediate @@ly , the ( ISO ) price cap will sow confusion in the market , threaten reliability and stifle new investment in generating capacity , '' read one letter written by Duke Energy Vice President William Hall III . column1: Meditation has to do with what is called ideation .
column2: Meditation has to do with what is called ideation .

column1: Find a comfortable place on the floor and sit with your legs crossed .
column2: Find a comfortable place on the floor and sit with your legs crossed .

column1: Place your hands one on top of the other in your lap , keep your back straight , keep eyes closed and keep tongue on the roof of your mouth .
column2: Place your hands one on top of the other in your lap , keep your back straight , keep eyes closed and keep tongue on the roof of your mouth .

column1: Your breathing should be calm and relaxed , through the nose .
column2: Your breathing should be calm and relaxed , through the nose .

column1: Spend a minute or so concentrating on your breath , feeling the air flowing through your nostrils .
column2: Spend a minute or so concentrating on your breath , feeling the air flowing through your nostrils .

column1: 1 . Warm Sun Visualization
column2: 1 . Warm Sun Visualization

column1: Continue to breathe slowly and deeply .
column2: Continue to breathe slowly and deeply .

column1: With each breath , feel the muscles in your body becoming lighter and lighter , and also your external motor and sensory organs are feeling like they are withdrawing from the world into a special inner quietness .
column2: With each breath , feel the muscle @@s in your body becoming lighter and lighter , and also your external motor and sensory organs are feeling like they are withdrawing from the world into a special inner quietness .

column1: Imagine the tension melting away as you continue breathing rhythmically and naturally .
column2: Imagine the tension melting away as you continue breathing rhythmically and naturally .

column1: Picture yourself sitting on a warm , tropical beach basking in the glow of the sun ... .
column2: Picture yourself sitting on a warm , tropical beach basking in the glow of the sun ... .

column1: Visualize the vivid , beautiful colours of the earth ( its flowers and plants ) , the sea next to you , and the sky above you .
column2: Visualize the vivid , beautiful colours of the earth ( its flower @@s and plants ) , the sea next to you , and the sky above you .

column1: Feel yourself floating above the earth and sea .
column2: Feel yourself floating above the earth and sea .

column1: As you sit above the world , the warmth of the golden sun penetrates your body and makes you feel warmer and warmer .
column2: As you sit above the world , the warmth of the golden sun penetrate @@s your body and makes you feel warmer and warmer .

column1: It surrounds you .
column2: It surrounds you .

column1: The golden rays feel soft and soothing .
column2: The golden rays feel soft and soothing .

column1: Now you are far above the earth - into space .
column2: Now you are far above the earth - into space .

column1: Everything around you is so vast .
column2: Everything around you is so vast .

column1: Yet , there is warmth and a familiarity with the vastness .
column2: Yet , there is warmth and a familiarity with the vastness .

column1: You want to merge your mind with the greater universal Mind that surrounds you .
column2: You want to merge your mind with the greater universal Mind that surrounds you .

column1: Continue to ideate on this intense desire for your mind to merge with the that universal Consciousness .
column2: Continue to ideate on this intense desire for your mind to merge with the that universal Consciousness .

column1: And while doing so continue using the Baba Nam Kevalam mantra ( breathe in with Baba Nam , breathe out with Kevalam ) .
column2: And while doing so continue using the Baba Nam Kevalam mantra ( breathe in with Baba Nam , breathe out with Kevalam ) .

column1: Try this for 5 to 10 minutes .
column2: Try this for 5 to 10 minutes .

column1: Now come back to earth again - slowly .
column2: Now come back to earth again - slowly .

column1: Imagine yourself sitting on the beach serenely and restfully .
column2: Imagine yourself sitting on the beach serenely and restful @@ly .

column1: Your muscles are loose and limp .
column2: Your muscle @@s are loose and limp .

column1: Feel your body sinking slightly into the sand making that earthly connection again .
column2: Feel your body sinking slightly into the sand making that earthly connection again .

column1: The sun 's rays and warmth are still with you , surrounding you .
column2: The sun 's rays and warmth are still with you , surrounding you .

column1: You are in a state of peace and relaxation .
column2: You are in a state of peace and relaxation .

column1: With each breath , watch your body and ensure that it remains relaxed - at peace .
column2: With each breath , watch your body and ensure that it remains relaxed - at peace .

column1: Continue to feel the warmth of the sunlight all over your body , warming you deeply and gently .
column2: Continue to feel the warmth of the sunlight all over your body , warming you deeply and gently .

column1: You want to bring something back with you from your deep space experience where you sensed your mind merging with the universal Mind .
column2: You want to bring something back with you from your deep space experience where you sensed your mind merging with the universal Mind .

column1: This will be the warmth of the sun - a close reminder and link between earth and the infinite space .
column2: This will be the warmth of the sun - a close reminder and link between earth and the infinite space .

column1: Visualize the inside of your body bathed in the golden light , absorbing every ray and glowing as radiantly as the sun .
column2: Visualize the inside of your body bathed in the golden light , absorbing every ray and glowing as radiantly as the sun .

column1: A warm , gentle breeze swirls around your body and relaxes you even more .
column2: A warm , gentle breeze swirls around your body and relaxes you even more .

column1: Let your mind and body be totally at peace .
column2: Let your mind and body be totally at peace .

column1: Open your eyes .
column2: Open your eyes .

column1: 2 . Mountain Visualization
column2: 2 . Mountain Visualization

column1: Another thing you can try .
column2: Another thing you can try .

column1: Imagine you 're sitting on top of a mountain , and that it 's the most peaceful place you can think of .
column2: Imagine you 're sitting on top of a mountain , and that it 's the most peaceful place you can think of .

column1: Feel that you 're sitting there in complete peace , right on top of the world .
column2: Feel that you 're sitting there in complete peace , right on top of the world .

column1: Now imagine that infinite happiness is surrounding you in every direction .
column2: Now imagine that infinite happiness is surrounding you in every direction .

column1: Feel you 're completely surrounded by that infinite peace and happiness .
column2: Feel you 're complete @@ly surrounded by that infinite peace and happiness .

column1: Now start to repeat within your mind the mantra : BABA NAM KEVALAM .
column2: Now start to repeat within your mind the mantra : BABA NAM KEVALAM .

column1: Its meaning is " Infinite happiness is everywhere " .
column2: Its meaning is " Infinite happiness is everywhere " .

column1: Feel the meaning , do n't just think of its wordy meaning or try to translate from Sanskrit ( BABA NAM KEVALAM ) to an English meaning ( Infinite peace and happiness ) .
column2: Feel the meaning , do n't just think of its wordy meaning or try to translate from Sanskrit ( BABA NAM KEVALAM ) to an English meaning ( Infinite peace and happiness ) .

column1: Think internally , intuitively , not by words , of the meaning , as you 're repeating it .
column2: Think internal @@ly , intuitive @@ly , not by words , of the meaning , as you 're repeating it .

column1: This is called ideation .
column2: This is called ideation .

column1: It is important to take the idea , not just the intellectual analysis .
column2: It is important to take the idea , not just the intellectual analysis .

column1: Touching deep into the idea is what builds intuition - it is a synthetic process .
column2: Touching deep into the idea is what builds intuition - it is a synthetic process .

column1: Feel you 're surrounded by infinite peace and happiness , and feel that your own sense of existence is in direct contact with that endless peace and happiness all around you .
column2: Feel you 're surrounded by infinite peace and happiness , and feel that your own sense of existence is in direct contact with that endless peace and happiness all around you .

column1: You can go further and feel that your unit consciousness , a dot in the Infinite Consciousness , is merging with Infinity .
column2: You can go further and feel that your unit consciousness , a dot in the Infinite Consciousness , is merging with Infinity .

column1: Continue for as long as you like , then open your eyes .
column2: Continue for as long as you like , then open your eyes .

column2: The important point is to develop some psycho @@- @@spiritual connection between your mind and the universal Consciousness or Supreme Consciousness .

column1: North Carolina Religious Coalition for Marriage Equality Declaration of Religious Leaders April 19 , 2004
column2: North Carolina Religious Coalition for Marriage Equality Declaration of Religious Leaders April 19 , 2004

column1: We become most fully human when we love another person .
column2: We become most fully human when we love another person .

column1: We can grow in our capacity to be human - to be loving - in a family unit .
column2: We can grow in our capacity to be human - to be loving - in a family unit .

column1: Throughout history , tyrants have known that by denying the right of oppressed peoples to form and nurture families , they can kill the spirit of those peoples .
column2: Throughout history , tyrants have known that by denying the right of oppressed peoples to form and nurture families , they can kill the spirit of those peoples .

column1: > From the shameful history of slavery in America , the injustice of forbidding people to marry is evident as a denial of a basic human right .
column2: > From the shameful history of slavery in America , the injustice of forbidding people to marry is evident as a denial of a basic human right .

column1: The American laws forbidding interracial marriage , now struck down , were clearly discriminatory .
column2: The American laws forbidding interracial marriage , now struck down , were clearly discriminatory .

column1: Denial of the status of marriage to those who would freely accept its responsibilities creates legal and economic inequities and social injustice .
column2: Denial of the status of marriage to those who would freely accept its responsibilities creates legal and economic inequities and social injustice .

column1: We feel called to protest and oppose this injustice .
column2: We feel called to protest and oppose this injustice .

column1: As religious people , clergy and lay leaders , we are mandated by faith to stand for justice in our common civic life .
column2: As religious people , clergy and lay leaders , we are mandated by faith to stand for justice in our common civic life .

column1: We oppose the use of sacred texts and religious traditions to deny legal equity to same - gender couples .
column2: We oppose the use of sacred texts and religious tradition @@s to deny legal equity to same - gender couple @@s .

column1: As concerned citizens we affirm the liberty of adults of the same gender to love and marry .
column2: As concerned citizen @@s we affirm the liberty of adults of the same gender to love and marry .

column1: We insist that no one , especially the state , is allowed to coerce people into marriage or bar two consenting adults , whether of the same or differing genders , from forming the family unit that lets them be more fully loving , thus more fully human .
column2: We insist that no one , especially the state , is allowed to coerce people into marriage or bar two consenting adults , whether of the same or differing genders , from forming the family unit that lets them be more fully loving , thus more fully human .

column1: We respect the fact that debate and discussion continue in many of our religious communities as to the scriptural , theological and liturgical issues involved .
column2: We respect the fact that debate and discussion continue in many of our religious communities as to the scriptural , theological and liturgical issues involved .

column1: However , we draw on our many faith traditions to arrive at a common conviction .
column2: However , we draw on our many faith tradition @@s to arrive at a common conviction .

column1: We affirm freedom of conscience in this matter .
column2: We affirm freedom of conscience in this matter .

column1: As faith leaders , we commit ourselves to public action , visibility , education , and mutual support in the service of the right and freedom to marry .
column2: As faith leaders , we commit ourselves to public action , visibility , education , and mutual support in the service of the right and freedom to marry .

column1: The One Reason Why All Americans Should Oppose The Nomination Of Samuel Alito
column2: The One Reason Why All American @@s Should Oppose The Nomination Of Samuel Alito

column1: He Would Tear Down Our System Of Checks And Balances , Giving Far Too Much Power To The President
column2: He Would Tear Down Our System Of Check @@s And Balance @@s , Giving Far Too Much Power To The President

column1: My Fellow Americans :
column2: My Fellow American @@s :

column1: A copy of the Constitution , with links back to the official source , is located at http://loveallpeople.org/usconstitutiona.txt
column2: A copy of the Constitution , with links back to the official source , is located at http://loveallpeople.o @@rg/usconstitutiona.txt

column1: Judge Samuel Alito is very highly qualified by all of the normal standards used to evaluate candidates for this position :
column2: Judge Samuel Alito is very highly qualified by all of the normal standard @@s used to evaluate candidate @@s for this position :

column1: He has a very high intellect .
column2: He has a very high intellect .

column1: He graduated very high in his class , from Princeton undergraduate and from Law School at Yale .
column2: He graduated very high in his class , from Princeton undergraduate and from Law School at Yale .

column1: He has a long and distinguished record , including many years as a Federal Appeals Judge , the next level below Supreme Court .
column2: He has a long and distinguished record , including many years as a Federal Appeals Judge , the next level below Supreme Court .

column1: He has encyclopedic knowledge of hundreds of different Supreme Court cases , and he can recite details from memory .
column2: He has encyclopedic knowledge of hundred @@s of different Supreme Court cases , and he can recite details from memory .

column1: He demonstrates an excellent " Judicial Temperament , " being courteous , mild - mannered , respectful of all people ; careful in his work , meticulous in detail .
column2: He demonstrate @@s an excellent " Judicial Temperament , " being courteous , mild - mannered , respectful of all people ; careful in his work , meticulous in detail .

column1: His fellow judges love him .
column2: His fellow judge @@s love him .

column1: His family loves him .
column2: His family loves him .

column1: President Bush loves him .
column2: President Bush loves him .

column1: Yes , it is true that some people do n't like the way they think he will vote on the Supreme Court .
column2: Yes , it is true that some people do n't like the way they think he will vote on the Supreme Court .

column1: But other people do like the way they think he will vote , and the ones who favor him seem to outnumber the ones who oppose him .
column2: But other people do like the way they think he will vote , and the ones who favor him seem to outnumber the ones who oppose him .

column1: So now the Senate is getting ready to vote soon , on whether to approve him or not ; and at this moment ( evening of Jan. 27 , 2006 ) it looks like he has more than the fifty - one votes needed for approval .
column2: So now the Senate is getting ready to vote soon , on whether to approve him or not ; and at this moment ( evening of Jan. 27 , 2006 ) it looks like he has more than the fifty - one votes needed for approval .

column1: The President is very eager to go ahead quickly and get this vote , because he very much wants to have Samuel Alito on the Supreme Court , to be judging the cases Bush is interested in .
column2: The President is very eager to go ahead quickly and get this vote , because he very much wants to have Samuel Alito on the Supreme Court , to be judging the cases Bush is interested in .

column1: So there is a lot of hurry - up pressure on the Senate to give its prompt vote of approval .
column2: So there is a lot of hurry - up pressure on the Senate to give its prompt vote of approval .

column1: There is an old saying that applies in this situation : " Act in haste , repent at leisure . "
column2: There is an old saying that applies in this situation : " Act in haste , repent at leisure . "

column1: Sometimes you can make a bad decision very quickly , then regret it for many years to come .
column2: Sometimes you can make a bad decision very quickly , then regret it for many years to come .

column1: That is what is about to happen with Judge Samuel Alito , in my opinion , because he has one tragic flaw - a very serious blind spot in his thinking - which makes him completely unacceptable for the position of Supreme Court Justice : He does not really agree with the system of " Checks and Balances " built into the Constitution , and he is ready to start tearing it down in order to follow the " Unitary Executive Theory , " which calls for vastly - increased Presidential Power at the expense of Congress and the Supreme Court .
column2: That is what is about to happen with Judge Samuel Alito , in my opinion , because he has one tragic flaw - a very serious blind spot in his thinking - which makes him complete @@ly unacceptable for the position of Supreme Court Justice : He does not really agree with the system of " Check @@s and Balance @@s " built into the Constitution , and he is ready to start tearing it down in order to follow the " Unitary Executive Theory , " which calls for vastly - increased Presidential Power at the expense of Congress and the Supreme Court .

column1: And because of this tragic flaw . . .
column2: And because of this tragic flaw . . .

column1: He Would Tear Down Our System Of Checks And Balances , Giving Far Too Much Power To The President .
column2: He Would Tear Down Our System Of Check @@s And Balance @@s , Giving Far Too Much Power To The President .

column1: In our Constitutional system , we have three branches of the Federal Government : the Legislative , Executive , and Judicial branches .
column2: In our Constitutional system , we have three branches of the Federal Government : the Legislative , Executive , and Judicial branches .

column1: And the basic idea behind the Checks and Balances we have is that if one branch of the Government goes crazy , the other two can hold it down .
column2: And the basic idea behind the Check @@s and Balance @@s we have is that if one branch of the Government goes crazy , the other two can hold it down .

column1: But Samuel Alito believes in a little - known Constitutional theory - called the " Unitary Executive Theory " - which says that the President should have complete control over the Executive Branch , and that the Executive Branch should be in charge of almost everything that the Government actually does , including the functions of the Independent Agencies which were designed to be free of Presidential control , and the Military , which exists , which is regulated , and which is funded by specific authority given by the Constitution to Congress , not to the President .
column2: But Samuel Alito believe @@s in a little - known Constitutional theory - called the " Unitary Executive Theory " - which says that the President should have complete control over the Executive Branch , and that the Executive Branch should be in charge of almost everything that the Government actually does , including the function @@s of the Independent Agencies which were designed to be free of Presidential control , and the Military , which exists , which is regulated , and which is funded by specific authority given by the Constitution to Congress , not to the President .

column1: The Military is not part of the Executive Branch : it is a separate entity .
column2: The Military is not part of the Executive Branch : it is a separate entity .

column1: Commander In Chief  does n't mean that he is the boss of the Military , merely mean that he is the Administrator , just as he is the Administrator of the Executive Branch , charged with " executing faithfully " all the laws passed by Congress and all the Decisions rendered by the Supreme Court .
column2: Commander In Chief does n't mean that he is the boss of the Military , merely mean that he is the Administrator , just as he is the Administrator of the Executive Branch , charged with " executing faithful @@ly " all the laws passed by Congress and all the Decisions rendered by the Supreme Court .

column1: Under the Unitary Executive Theory , the Laws of Congress and Decisions of the Supreme Court have no actual authority unless the President agrees with them .
column2: Under the Unitary Executive Theory , the Laws of Congress and Decisions of the Supreme Court have no actual authority unless the President agrees with them .

column1: And so Congress and the Supreme Court become mere advisors to the President , with no real authority over him .
column2: And so Congress and the Supreme Court become mere advisor @@s to the President , with no real authority over him .

column1: And the President becomes a Dictator , unrestrained by anything in the Constitution , backed up by the Armed Forces , which would be entirely under his personal control .
column2: And the President become @@s a Dictator , unrestrained by anything in the Constitution , backed up by the Armed Forces , which would be entirely under his personal control .

column1: took a bit of searching to discover that POP is probably PoP - plaster of Paris and yes plaster of Paris will slow way down if it is not exposed to air - in fact , if you are building up plaster ( " the way you would icing " ) to do sculpting , which is rather uncommon , you keep the set plaster damp in order to add more unset plaster or you have to wet the area where you will be adding plaster " mud "
column2: took a bit of searching to discover that POP is probably PoP - plaster of Paris and yes plaster of Paris will slow way down if it is not exposed to air - in fact , if you are building up plaster ( " the way you would icing " ) to do sculpting , which is rather uncommon , you keep the set plaster damp in order to add more unset plaster or you have to wet the area where you will be adding plaster " mud "

column1: Plaster of Paris does two things
column2: Plaster of Paris does two things

column1: - it chemically sets - gets warm to hot then cools down and hard and
column2: - it chemical @@ly sets - gets warm to hot then cools down and hard and

column1: - it dries out , losing the water that is soaked into the set structure
column2: - it dries out , losing the water that is soaked into the set structure

column2: turn the modem off and see if the sound is still there ... could be static on the line ... if the sound is still there with the modem off then the problem is NOT the DSL ....

column1: if the trouble goes away with the modem off , then make sure that EVERYTHING EXCEPT the modem is filtered , this would include the alarm system , fax machine , satellite boxes , phones , etc ...
column2: if the trouble goes away with the modem off , then make sure that EVERY @@THING EXCEPT the modem is filtered , this would include the alarm system , fax machine , satellite boxes , phones , etc ...

column2: if everything is filtered , and you still have this problem - try changing the filter - if it is still there , try doubling up on the filters ...

column1: 1 ) The Italian Renaissance began the opening phase of the Renaissance , a period of great cultural change and achievement in Europe that spanned the period from the end of the 13th century to about 1600 , marking the transition between Medieval and Early Modern Europe .
column2: 1 ) The Italian Renaissance began the opening phase of the Renaissance , a period of great cultural change and achievement in Europe that spanned the period from the end of the 13th century to about 1600 , marking the transition between Medieval and Early Modern Europe .

column1: The term renaissance is in essence a modern one that came into currency in the 19th century , in the work of historians such as Jacob Burckhardt .
column2: The term renaissance is in essence a modern one that came into currency in the 19th century , in the work of historians such as Jacob Burckhardt .

column1: Although the origins of a movement that was confined largely to the literate culture of intellectual endeavor and patronage can be traced to the earlier part of the 14th century , many aspects of Italian culture and society remained largely Medieval ; the Renaissance did not come into full swing until the end of the century .
column2: Although the origins of a movement that was confined largely to the literate culture of intellectual endeavor and patronage can be traced to the earlier part of the 14th century , many aspects of Italian culture and society remained largely Medieval ; the Renaissance did not come into full swing until the end of the century .

column1: 2 ) The expression High Renaissance , in art history , is a periodizing convention used to denote the apogee of the visual arts in the Italian Renaissance .
column2: 2 ) The expression High Renaissance , in art history , is a periodizing convention used to denote the apogee of the visual arts in the Italian Renaissance .

column1: This term was first used in German ( Hochrenaissance ) in the early nineteenth century , and has its origins in the " High Style " of painting and sculpture described by Johann Joachim Winckelmann .
column2: This term was first used in German ( Hochrenaissance ) in the early nineteenth century , and has its origins in the " High Style " of painting and sculpture described by Johann Joachim Winckelmann .

column1: [ 1 ] Over the last twenty years , use of the term has been frequently criticized by academic art historians for over-simplifying artistic developments , ignoring historical context , and focusing only on a few iconic works .
column2: [ 1 ] Over the last twenty years , use of the term has been frequent @@ly criticized by academic art historians for over @@- @@simplifying artistic development @@s , ignoring historical context , and focusing only on a few iconic works .

column1: How do you make your cat adjust to a new house ?
column2: How do you make your cat adjust to a new house ?

column1: Me and my family are moving into a new house just outside a small town .
column2: Me and my family are moving into a new house just outside a small town .

column1: We are currently living a mile from the town in a house surrounded by fields but the new house is beside a busy road .
column2: We are currently living a mile from the town in a house surrounded by fields but the new house is beside a busy road .

column1: We have had the cat for 10 years and do nt want to leave it .
column2: We have had the cat for 10 years and do nt want to leave it .

column1: How could we make it settle in a new house .
column2: How could we make it settle in a new house .

column1: you are not just moving house - your cat is losing his territory .
column2: you are not just moving house - your cat is losing his territory .

column1: you will need to give him only a small place to explore , so he can make it his territory , and feel safe there .
column2: you will need to give him only a small place to explore , so he can make it his territory , and feel safe there .

column1: then , he can have a place to retreat to when he feels scared .
column2: then , he can have a place to retreat to when he feels scared .

column1: you will need to get his box and bowls , and whatever blanket and toys are his , and smell like home , and put him in a room .
column2: you will need to get his box and bowls , and whatever blanket and toys are his , and smell like home , and put him in a room .

column1: close the door , and keep him in there for a week .
column2: close the door , and keep him in there for a week .

column1: he will explore the room , mark everything with his cheek , and try to make it feel like his territory .
column2: he will explore the room , mark everything with his cheek , and try to make it feel like his territory .

column1: he will reassure himself that no other animal is in there , and that no other animal will come in - he is afraid that he is in someone else 's territory when he is in a new house .
column2: he will reassure himself that no other animal is in there , and that no other animal will come in - he is afraid that he is in someone else 's territory when he is in a new house .

column1: in a week 's time , he will have made it his , and will be getting more bored than afraid .
column2: in a week 's time , he will have made it his , and will be getting more bored than afraid .

column1: let him out for half an hour , to explore .
column2: let him out for half an hour , to explore .

column1: then put him back in .
column2: then put him back in .

column1: extend the time he is out each day , but for the first month , always put him in his room at night , so he feels safe to sleep .
column2: extend the time he is out each day , but for the first month , always put him in his room at night , so he feels safe to sleep .

column1: soon he will make the whole house his , but he needs that one safe place to start from .
column2: soon he will make the whole house his , but he needs that one safe place to start from .

column1: remember to visit with him while he is in the room , and tell him how good he is .
column2: remember to visit with him while he is in the room , and tell him how good he is .

column1: remember to give him the time he needs to feel that the room is his - rush it , and he will be afraid of the whole house for a long time .
column2: remember to give him the time he needs to feel that the room is his - rush it , and he will be afraid of the whole house for a long time .

column1: he might even start peeing on things in fear .
column2: he might even start peeing on things in fear .

column1: good luck with your new house and with his new territory !
column2: good luck with your new house and with his new territory !

column1: I have done Yoga for riders for a while , a 20 minute routine I found on YouTube ( I think it s called " Yoga for horse back riding " hosted by a man ) It helped with noticing slight differences in my balance and weight distribution but helped not really for the way I use my legs and back .
column2: I have done Yoga for riders for a while , a 20 minute routine I found on YouTube ( I think it s called " Yoga for horse back riding " hosted by a man ) It helped with noticing slight difference @@s in my balance and weight distribution but helped not really for the way I use my legs and back .

column1: Here is what I do now and it really helps ....
column2: Here is what I do now and it really helps ....

column1: When I first get on I take 1 leg and pull it back up to touch my butt with my heel and hold it there for 1 lap at a walk around a large dressage arena .
column2: When I first get on I take 1 leg and pull it back up to touch my butt with my heel and hold it there for 1 lap at a walk around a large dressage arena .

column1: Then the same thing with the other leg .
column2: Then the same thing with the other leg .

column1: Then 1 lap at a walk around the arena with both my legs pulled out as far as I can , so they are not touching the saddle .
column2: Then 1 lap at a walk around the arena with both my legs pulled out as far as I can , so they are not touching the saddle .

column1: Then a lap doing scissors , one leg forward as far as I can and the other back , then switch legs .
column2: Then a lap doing scissors , one leg forward as far as I can and the other back , then switch legs .

column1: If the weight is going into your heels ( it throws your leg forward ) put the stirrups up against the heel of your boot .
column2: If the weight is going into your heels ( it throws your leg forward ) put the stirrups up against the heel of your boot .

column1: Do a nice working trot , not a slow trot .
column2: Do a nice working trot , not a slow trot .

column1: All this will help you use both legs evenly , keep proper contact and use your wight correctly , to keep your leg in a good position .
column2: All this will help you use both legs evenly , keep proper contact and use your wight correctly , to keep your leg in a good position .

column1: BTW you do nt want your leg locked in place , it will move WITH the horse a bit .
column2: BTW you do nt want your leg locked in place , it will move WITH the horse a bit .

column2: When I first started doing it I 'd do it every day .
